entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:37 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3 except minus 7 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 3 except minus 7 inland. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero except minus 4 inland and over higher terrain. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow and blowing snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed areas in the afternoon. High zero except minus 4 inland and over higher terrain. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 4 inland and over higher terrain.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm except 20 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed areas. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 4 inland and over higher terrain. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Windy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
